KitKat::

She continued towards the base. She was having difficulty making her 
way. Her own injuries were not making things easier. She was leaving 
a mech fluid trail and her body was feeling weak. She had to stop for 
a minute when she had reached the half way point to the base. She 
rested for a few minutes, then kept going. With luck, she would reach 
the base without passing out.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw remained uncouncious as he was swung over KitKat's 
shoulder. He only made a few barely audiable sounds of pain, as he 
was in emergency stasis lock. His internal repairs started to kick in.
